text: Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, Abraham uan boriba ko uan ovavir boribar sure damightɨ me Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akamɨn gɨn mangam. Egh me arazir aghuiba ko arazir nan damazimɨn derazibara darara gɨn mangam. Kamaghɨn, kɨ ua bagha Abraham ginaba. Egh gɨn kɨ uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨ, Abraham deravɨram a damuam.”
